description: Don rings up quite a bill at the local store. Theyaccept his check and schedule someone to deliver his goods. When the delivery boy arrives Don is only wearing his bathrobe. In the kitchen Don opens his robe -- instead of the bare cupboards -- and the delivery boy is quickly all over that fat dick.
series: Falcon Bareback Vol 08 - Blue Collar Balling
title: Falcon Bareback Vol 08 - Blue Collar Balling
